Package interfaces

Interface IAppointmentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentService
public interface IAppointmentService
Interface for appointment-related service operations. Provides methods to manage appointments such as scheduling, cancellation, rescheduling, viewing scheduled appointments, fetching appointment details, and recording outcomes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
    Cancels an existing appointment.

    Fetches the details of a specific appointment by its ID.
    List<LocalDateTime>

    Retrieves the available time slots for a specific doctor on a specific date.
    void
    recordAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId, String serviceProvided, List<Medication> prescribedMedications, List<Integer> prescribedQuantities, String consultationNotes)
    Records the outcome of a completed appointment, including services provided, prescribed medications, quantities, and consultation notes.

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      boolean scheduleAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Schedules a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to be scheduled.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully scheduled, false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      boolean cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      boolean rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, Appointment newAppointment)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date and time.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be rescheduled.
      newAppointment - The updated appointment details.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.

    • viewScheduledAppointments

      List<Appointment> viewScheduledAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of all scheduled appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of all scheduled appointments.

    • getAppointment

      Appointment getAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Fetches the details of a specific appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found, or null if no such appointment exists.

    • getAvailableSlots

      List<LocalDateTime> getAvailableSlots(String doctorId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the available time slots for a specific doctor on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor whose availability is to be checked.
      date - The date for which to retrieve available slots.
      Returns:
      A list of available LocalDateTime slots for the doctor on the given date.

    • getAppointmentById

      Appointment getAppointmentById(String appointmentId)
      Fetches the details of a specific appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found, or null if no such appointment exists.

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      void recordAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId, String serviceProvided, List<Medication> prescribedMedications, List<Integer> prescribedQuantities, String consultationNotes)
      Records the outcome of a completed appointment, including services provided, prescribed medications, quantities, and consultation notes.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment whose outcome is to be recorded.
      serviceProvided - The service provided during the appointment.
      prescribedMedications - A list of medications prescribed during the appointment.
      prescribedQuantities - A list of quantities corresponding to the prescribed medications.
      consultationNotes - Notes recorded during the consultation.
